biotools.summary: The reciprocal smallest distance (RSD) algorithm (Wall, et al., 2003.) accurately infers orthologs between pairs of genomes by considering global sequence alignment and maximum likelihood evolutionary distance between sequences.

bioschemas.name: Reciprocal Smallest Distance (RSD)
bioschemas.summary: The reciprocal smallest distance (RSD) algorithm (Wall, et al., 2003.) accurately infers orthologs between pairs of genomes by considering global sequence alignment and maximum likelihood evolutionary distance between sequences.
